rows.label: qev090704_MSG0001
rows.name: Is... Is it safe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0002
rows.name:
Indeed. And all thanks to the BLADEs
you're always sneering at.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0003
rows.name: H.B., is that you?! You came running to save me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0004
rows.name: Boy, I sure did pick the right college buddy. Hooo boy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0005
rows.name: That has nothing to do with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0005_02
rows.name: I came here because you have certain skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0006
rows.name: Skills that NLA requires. Your death would be...problematic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0006_02
rows.name: There was nothing personal about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0007
rows.name:
Same old H.B., heh!
Still, you saved my life, and I won't forget it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0008
rows.name:
And I'll never make another crack about BLADE either.
Scientist's honor![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0009
rows.name:
See that you don't.
As I say, researchers are vital to our success on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0010
rows.name: But without us, you'd all be dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0012
rows.name:
And you. You performed well.
Truth be told, I might have struggled on my own. ...A tad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0013
rows.name:
If I can return the favor at some point,
I would be open to assisting you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0014
rows.name:
I see now that you are worthy of the honor
of being my partner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev090704_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell H.B. that you'll think about it.

rows.label: qev090704_JNK0020
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: qev090704_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you're nothing special.

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0015
rows.name:
The future BLADE commander just showered you
with praise and that's your reaction?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0016
rows.name: I thought you'd be overcome with joy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0017
rows.name:
I can see how you'd think that,
standing next to the future BLADE commander and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0018
rows.name: But truly, you're not half-bad at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0019
rows.name:
In any case, you now have the opportunity
to work at my side again in the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090704_MSG0020
rows.name: Let's spur each other on as rivals and friends and so forth.[ST:wait ]
